product_name: Black Diamond Neutrino Wiregate Carabiner - Blemished
long_description: The nimble Black Diamond Neutrino Wiregate Carabiner is the ideal 'biner for racking gear or using on a quickdraw whether you're a big wall climber or traditional alpinist. 7075-T6 aluminum body features a large area to seat slings and draws securely, and a nose hood to protect the gate from being opened accidentally. Large gate opening allows quick clip-ins. Useful in mountaineering or ice climbing applications because the 1-piece gate and spring mechanism won't freeze up. Great for racking cams and nuts on your gear sling. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated. Blemished; item has minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The nimble Black Diamond Neutrino Wiregate Carabiner is the ideal 'biner for racking gear or using on a quickdraw whether you're a big wall climber or traditional alpinist.
